metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1772 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: It's possible to craft Lost Password requests with wildcards in the Tokenvalue, which allows attacker to retrieve valid Token(s), generated by userswhich already requested new passwords. This issue affects: ((OTRS))Community Edition 5.0.41 and prior versions, 6.0.26 and prior versions.OTRS: 7.0.15 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
